docs.title: Chad Eline
docs.text: Risk and analytics professional specializing in regulatory compliance, data engineering/science, and risk management for large financial institutions.

docs.title: What I Do
docs.text:
• Data Engineering

    ETL pipelines, data warehousing, and cloud migrations

  • Risk Managment

    GARP Financial Risk Management Professional

  • Econometric Modeling

    Balance sheet forecasting and capital planning analytics

  • Data Science

    Hands on experience delivering applied AI models (OCR, NLP, and XGBoost) for real world business problems.

docs.title: Highlights
docs.text:
• Company MVP 2022

    Led enterprise-scale Azure migration of regulatory models and data infrastructure.

  • $17B LCR Impact

    Built FDIC calculation engine, which processed 163M daily records, cutting LCR outflow by $17B and closing a Fed MRA.

docs.title: Background
docs.text: Risk and analytics professional with a passion for data science and 10+ years of experience delivering regulatory compliance solutions and data infrastructure for financial institutions. Expertise in ETL pipelines, data warehousing, econometric modeling, and cloud migration.

docs.title: Risk Consultant II
docs.text:
The Financial Risk Group · Cary, NC · Dec 2020 – Present

  • Built an end-to-end data pipeline to extract, classify, and summarize unstructured documents into structured datasets using OCR, NLP, and XGBoost
  • Designed and presented a Python-based PySpark job scheduler, improving reliability and scalability of batch processing workflows
  • Consulted on and implemented multiple regulatory and stress-testing models (IFRS9, EWST, FST) using Python, Go, and SAS
  • Led Balance Sheet, Income Statement, and PPNR forecasting models for regulatory and strategic decision-making
  • Led analysis, design, and implementation of a client's Federal Reserve Board FR Y-14A reporting solution
  • Served as development lead for enterprise ETL platform modernization to Azure

Company MVP 2022

Led large-scale migration from legacy on-premise infrastructure to Microsoft Azure:

  • Basel, CCAR, and IFRS models
  • Model backtesting and monitoring frameworks
  • ETL pipelines and enterprise data warehouse
  • De-identification and PII handling for security compliance

docs.title: Risk Consultant I
docs.text:
The Financial Risk Group · Cary, NC · Jun 2016 – Dec 2020

  • Delivered CCAR and DFAST analytics solutions (2016–2020) and IFRS9 implementations (2019-2021)
  • Designed forecasting and reporting platforms for Income Statement, Balance Sheet, and revenue projections
  • Developed replacement platform for internal capital planning and regulatory reporting
  • Optimized high-volume database loads, reducing one critical pipeline from 4 hours to 15 minutes

docs.title: Data Warehouse Solutions Architect
docs.text:
Bank of America · Charlotte, NC · Jan 2015 – Jun 2016

  • Designed FDIC calculation engine processing 163 million records daily, reducing LCR outflow by $17B and resolving a Federal Reserve MRA
  • Redesigned Operational Deposits data warehouse feed, reducing runtime from 4 hours to 55 minutes
  • Led ETL and data warehouse architecture for 40+ onshore and offshore developers
  • Devised technical solution for Bank of America's Federal Reserve 5G Liquidity report

Platinum Global Recognition Award

Leadership and execution in resolving the FDIC MRA

docs.title: Software Developer, Vice President
docs.text:
Bank of America · Charlotte, NC · Mar 2014 – Dec 2014

  • Implemented derivatives and collateral data warehouse with $9.67B impact on LCR reporting
  • Led 25+ member development team through 70+ successful production migrations as Release Lead
  • Designed and automated release process, reducing deployment from 2 days to 2 hours
  • Authored 77-page development standards document establishing consistent practices

Quote

1 Platinum, 2 Gold, and 3 Silver Global Recognition Awards

docs.title: Assistant Risk Consultant
docs.text:
The Financial Risk Group · Cary, NC · Dec 2012 – Feb 2014

  • Parallelized 65-million-record daily data feed, reducing runtime from 3 days to 3 hours
  • Integrated multiple source systems into enterprise ETL workflows and dimensional models
  • Designed dimensional tables and ETL flows for regulatory compliance data marts

docs.title: Certifications
docs.text:
• Financial Risk Manager GARP Certified

  • Base SAS 9 SAS Certified

docs.text: A showcase of personal projects and open-source tools. Coming soon.

docs.title: Want to Collaborate?
docs.text: I'm always interested in working on interesting projects. Feel free to reach out if you have an idea or opportunity.
